targets.rawSql:
SELECT imu_acelx, imu_acely, imu_acelz, imu_girox, imu_giroy, imu_giroz, imu_magx, imu_magy, imu_magz,
            uv_uva, uv_uvb, uv_uvc, uv_temperature, cpu_usage, ram_usage, total_ram,
            disk_usage, disk_usage_gb, total_disk_gb, sys_temperature,
            lat, lon, alt, headmot, roll, pitch, heading, nmea,
            lat_hp, lon_hp, alt_hp, bmp_pressure, bmp_temperature, bmp_altitude,
            ds18b20_temperature_interior, ds18b20_temperature_exterior, timestamp FROM sensor_readings
SELECT uv_uva AS "UVA", uv_uvb AS "UVB", uv_uvc AS "UVC", "timestamp" FROM sensor_readings
SELECT lat AS "LAT", lon AS "LON" FROM sensor_readings LIMIT 50
SELECT uv_temperature AS "UV", bmp_temperature AS "BMP", ds18b20_temperature_interior AS "INTERIOR", ds18b20_temperature_exterior AS "EXTERIOR", timestamp FROM sensor_readings
SELECT bmp_altitude AS "BMP", alt AS "GPS", alt_hp AS "GPS Precision", "timestamp" FROM sensor_readings

SELECT imu_acelx AS "IMU",
            uv_uva AS "UV", 
            cpu_usage AS "SYSTEM",
            lat AS "GPS", 
            bmp_pressure AS "BMP",
            ds18b20_temperature_interior AS "DS18B20", timestamp FROM sensor_readings

SELECT 
    imu_acelx AS "Accel X",
    imu_acely AS "Accel Y",
    imu_acelz AS "Accel Z",
    imu_girox AS "Gyro X",
    imu_giroy AS "Gyro Y",
    imu_giroz AS "GyroZ",
    imu_magx AS "Mag X",
    imu_magy AS "Mag Y",
    imu_magz AS "Mag Z",
    uv_uva AS "UVA",
    uv_uvb AS "UVB",
    uv_uvc AS "UVC",
    uv_temperature AS "UV Sensor Temperature",
    cpu_usage AS "CPU Usage (%)",
    ram_usage AS "RAM Usage (%)",
    total_ram AS "Total RAM (MB)",
    disk_usage AS "Disk Usage (%)",
    disk_usage_gb AS "Disk Usage (GB)",
    total_disk_gb AS "Total Disk (GB)",
    sys_temperature AS "System Temperature",
    lat AS "Latitude",
    lon AS "Longitude",
    headmot AS "HeadMot",
    distance AS "Distance",
    bmp_pressure AS "BMP Press",
    bmp_temperature AS "BMP Temp",
    bmp_altitude AS "BMP Alt",
    ds18b20_temperature_interior AS "Interior Temp",
    ds18b20_temperature_exterior AS "Exterior Temp",
    timestamp AS "Timestamp"
FROM 
    sensor_readings;
SELECT imu_girox AS "GIROX", imu_giroy AS "GIROY", imu_giroz AS "GIROZ", "timestamp" FROM sensor_readings
SELECT imu_acelx AS "ACELX", imu_acely AS "ACELY", imu_acelz AS "ACELZ", "timestamp" FROM sensor_readings
SELECT imu_magx AS "MAGX", imu_magy AS "MAGY", imu_magz AS "MAGZ", "timestamp" FROM sensor_readings

SELECT imu_acelx, imu_acely, imu_acelz, imu_girox, imu_giroy, imu_giroz, imu_magx, imu_magy, imu_magz,
            uv_uva, uv_uvb, uv_uvc, uv_temperature, cpu_usage, ram_usage, total_ram,
            disk_usage, disk_usage_gb, total_disk_gb, sys_temperature,
            lat, lon, alt, headmot, roll, pitch, heading, nmea,
            lat_hp, lon_hp, alt_hp, distance, bmp_pressure, bmp_temperature, bmp_altitude,
            ds18b20_temperature_interior, ds18b20_temperature_exterior, timestamp FROM sensor_readings
